name: Hero Runner (AnarchyFox)
description:
PC CONTROLS: SPACE = JUMP -- RCTRL = ATTACK

Version 0.1 of Hero Runner, a hyper-casual, fantasy styled , infinite runner.
Run through the land to defeat monsters and collect coins!
(Still in development, I am aware of some bugs.)

Ver 0.2 changelog:

  1. Shop menu now remembers what skin was equipped
  2. Added flying Ahriman enemy
  3. Game pace gradually builds overtime
  4. Retaining 'Rive' powerup upon death has been fixed.
  5. No audio on Shield breaking fixed
  6. Cloud direction and layering fixed
  7. Web version

Planned features:

  1. More skins/recolours
  2. More enemy variety
  3. Boss battles(????)

Known Bugs:

  1. Touchscreen and keyboard controls conflict
  2. Gaps in floor/background
  3. Slight delay on touchscreen jumping
